A data transfer object (DTO) that defines filter criteria for querying tools through the REST API, providing optional filters for tool properties like status, type, category, and platform.

## Key Components

- **Boolean enabled** - Filter tools by their enabled/disabled status
- **String type** - Filter by specific tool type
- **String category** - Filter by tool category classification
- **String platformCategory** - Filter by platform-specific category
- **Lombok annotations** - Automatic generation of getters, setters, constructors, and builder pattern
- **OpenAPI Schema** - API documentation annotations for Swagger/OpenAPI specification

## Usage Example

```java
// Create filter criteria using builder pattern
ToolFilterCriteria criteria = ToolFilterCriteria.builder()
    .enabled(true)
    .type("data-processing")
    .category("analytics")
    .platformCategory("web")
    .build();

// Use in REST controller
@GetMapping("/tools")
public List<Tool> getTools(@ModelAttribute ToolFilterCriteria criteria) {
    return toolService.findToolsByCriteria(criteria);
}

// Filter only enabled tools of specific type
ToolFilterCriteria enabledFilter = ToolFilterCriteria.builder()
    .enabled(true)
    .type("integration")
    .build();
```

The class serves as a flexible filtering mechanism where all fields are optional, allowing clients to specify any combination of criteria to narrow down tool search results through the API.
